directions: Heat oil in heavy large nonstick skillet over high heat. Add garlic and ginger and stir-fry 1 minute. Add next 5 ingredients and stir-fry until just tender, about 3 minutes. Add rice and toss to combine. Add oyster sauce, water and chili paste and stir-fry until sauce is evenly distributed and mixture is heated through, about 2 minutes. Mound in large bowl. Garnish with green onions and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1/2 leek (white and pale green parts only), cut lengthwise into thin strips
1 carrot, peeled, shredded into thin strips with vegetable peeler
1 zucchini, trimmed, cut into long matchstick-size strips
4 fresh shiitake mushrooms, stems trimmed, cut into thin strips
3 cups cold cooked brown rice (about 1 cup uncooked)
*Oyster sauce and chili paste are available at Asian markets and in the Asian section of some supermarkets.
title: Spicy Brown Rice and Vegetable Stir-Fry with Oyster Sauce
